info.title: Goibibo Developer API
info.description: You can make use of our travel options via this

get.description: The search API enables you to search for operational flights based on specified parameters, i.e. route details, departure and arrival dates, cabin type and passenger details.

parameters.name: app_id
parameters.description: Your access application id

parameters.name: app_key
parameters.description: Your access application key

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Response format

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: Origin Airport code. Should be a valid IATA code

parameters.name: destination
parameters.description: Destination Airport code. Should be a valid IATA code

parameters.name: dateofdeparture
parameters.description: Departure Date (onward flights only). Format (YYYYMMDD)

parameters.name: dateofarrival
parameters.description: Arrival Date (onward & return Flights). Format (YYYYMMDD)

parameters.name: seatingclass
parameters.description: Travel Class/Cabin Type. E(Economy) or B(Business).

parameters.name: adults
parameters.description: No of Adults. Integer value between 1-9. Minimum of one adult is required.

parameters.name: children
parameters.description: No of children.  Integer value between 0-9.

parameters.name: infants
parameters.description: No of infants.  Integer value between 0-9.

get.description: The Minimum fare API gives you the details of flight having minimum fare in a given sector and date range.

parameters.name: app_id
parameters.description: Your access application id

parameters.name: app_key
parameters.description: Your access application key

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Response format.

parameters.name: vertical
parameters.description: The vertical for which minimum fare details are required. Send 'flight' to get airline details and 'bus' for bus details. Default is flight.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: Origin Airport/City code. In case of flights, it should be a valid IATA code

parameters.name: destination
parameters.description: Destination Airport/City code. In case of flight, it should be a valid IATA code

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: Mode of result. 'one' returns only one airline/bus per day which has the minimum fare. All returns minimum fares for all available airlines/buses per day. Default value is one.

parameters.name: sdate
parameters.description: Starting of date range for which minimum fares are required (YYYYMMDD format)

parameters.name: edate
parameters.description: Ending of date range for which minimum fares are required (YYYYMMDD format). Default value equals sdate

parameters.name: class
parameters.description: Travel Class/Cabin Type. NA(no filtering is done by class), E(Economy), B(Business). Default value is NA. This parameter is applicable only for flights

get.description: This API provides available bus details operating in a given sector as per the chosen dates.

parameters.name: app_id
parameters.description: Your access application id

parameters.name: app_key
parameters.description: Your access application key

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Response format. xml or json. Default value is json

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: Origin city. Eg- bangalore

parameters.name: destination
parameters.description: Destination city. Eg-hyderabad

parameters.name: dateofdeparture
parameters.description: Start date for onward bus journey. Format (YYYYMMDD)

parameters.name: dateofarrival
parameters.description: Start date for return bus journey. Format (YYYYMMDD). It's optional, required only for roundtrip journey.

get.summary: Returns bus seats layout and availability
get.description: This API provides details of seat availablity and layout of a bus running on a particular sector on a given day.

parameters.name: app_id
parameters.description: Your access application id

parameters.name: app_key
parameters.description: Your access application key

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Response format. xml or json. Default value is json

parameters.name: skey
parameters.description: Search key of the bus whose seat map is required. Search key is given by the bus search API for every bus.

get.description: The 'Search hotel by city' API enables you to get a list of hotels available in a city alongwith information of each hotel.

parameters.name: app_id
parameters.description: Your access application id

parameters.name: app_key
parameters.description: Your access application key

parameters.name: method
parameters.description: Name of the method to call. In this case set it as 'hotels.get_hotels_data_by_city'

parameters.name: city_id
parameters.description: City ID. Example for Bangalore use 6771549831164675055 . The entire list of city ids can be found in the 'Data' section.

get.description: Get Hotel Data API fetches all the static details of the hotel like images, description, categorization, location, room information etc.

parameters.name: app_id
parameters.description: Your access application id

parameters.name: app_key
parameters.description: Your access application key

parameters.name: method
parameters.description: Type of response required

parameters.name: id_type
parameters.description: The type of id being passed in 'id_list' parameter. You need to set it as '_id'

get.description: This API fetches the price information of all the available hotels in the given city.

parameters.name: app_id
parameters.description: Your access application id

parameters.name: app_key
parameters.description: Your access application key

parameters.name: city_id
parameters.description: City ID of the city for which hotel prices are required. Example for Bangalore use 6771549831164675055. The full list of city ids can be found in 'Data' section.

parameters.name: check_in
parameters.description: Hotel Check in date in the format YYYYMMDD

parameters.name: check_out
parameters.description: Hotel Check out date in the format YYYYMMDD
